sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../NavBar/NavBar'; import Alert from '../Alert/Alert'; import { NAMES_REGEX, USERNAME_REGEX, EMAIL_REGEX, PASSWORD_REGEX } from '../../variables/Regex'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { RiUser3Fill } from 'react-icons/ri'; import { IoIosArrowForward } from 'react-icons/io'; import { IoSettingsOutline } from 'react-icons/io5'; const Profile = () => { useEffect( () => { document.title = 'Profil - Matcha' }, []) /* modification of user information */ const infoChange = { lastname: false, firstname: false, username: false, email: false, password: false } const [infoState, setInfoState] = useState(infoChange) const handleModification = (info, stateInfo) => { // this avoids the modification of several information at the same time setInfoState(Object.assign(infoState, infoChange)) setInfoState({...infoState, [info]: !stateInfo}) } /* new values */ const loginData = { lastname: 'Gadacha', firstname: 'Honsse', username: 'Username93', email: 'test@gmail.com', currentPassword: '', newPassword: '', newPasswordConfirmation: '' } const [data, setData] = useState(loginData); const { lastname, firstname, username, email, currentPassword, newPassword, newPasswordConfirmation } = data const handleChange = e => { setData({...data, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}); console.log(e.target.value) } const userFormInfo = [ { label: 'Nom', info: lastname, id: 'lastname', type:'text', small: false, stateInfo: infoState.lastname }, { label: 'Prénom', info: firstname, id: 'firstname', type:'text', small: false, stateInfo: infoState.firstname }, { label: 'Nom d\'utilisateur', info: username, type:'text', small: 'ex: pseudo, pseudo46, pseudo-46, pseudo_46 (15 car. max).', id: 'username', stateInfo: infoState.username }, { label: 'E-mail', info: email, type:'email', small: false, id: 'email', stateInfo: infoState.email } ] useState() const infoUser = userFormInfo.map( info => { return (
{!info.stateInfo ?
{info.label} {info.info}
handleModification(info.id, info.stateInfo)}>
:
{info.label} {info.small}
}
) }) const infoPassword = !infoState.password ?
Mot de passe •••••••••••••
handleModification('password', infoState.password)}>
:
Mot de passe actuel Nouveau mot de passe 6 caract. min, 1 majusc., 1 chiffre et 1 caract. spécial. Confirmer le nouveau mot de passe
return (

Profil

Vos informations personelles

{infoUser}
{infoPassword}
) } export default Profile
